trans-unit.source: Contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 집합을 제한 하는 데 사용 되는 속성이 포함 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> 에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A SqlTrackingQueryOptions contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method against the tracking data in a database used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SqlTrackingQueryOptions에는 집합 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> 사용 되는 데이터베이스에서 추적 데이터에 대해 메서드</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 반환</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> 을 제한 하는 데 사용 되는 속성이 포함 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> in the collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> must correspond to a workflow instance which has tracking data associated with it in the database that meets the conditions specified by the properties of the SqlTrackingQueryOptions.
trans-unit.target: 각 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>의 컬렉션에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>는 SqlTrackingQueryOptions의 속성에 지정 된 조건을 만족 하는 데이터베이스에 연결 된 추적 데이터가 있는 워크플로 인스턴스와 일치 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>클래스</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> 의 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing` Visual basic에서). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing` Visual basic에서). | 이러한 값을 지정 하는 호출을 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>반환할지 여부는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>추적 데이터가 데이터베이스에 있는 모든 워크플로 인스턴스에 대 한 개체입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resets the properties of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 속성의 기본값으로 다시 설정 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"> </xref> 를 기본값으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>클래스</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> 의 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing` Visual basic에서). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing` Visual basic에서). | 이러한 값을 지정 하는 호출을 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>반환할지 여부는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>추적 데이터가 데이터베이스에 있는 모든 워크플로 인스턴스에 대 한 개체입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the upper limit of the time period that, together with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref:System.DateTime>시간 간격의 상한값을 지정 하는와 함께 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, 집합을 제한 하는 데 사용 되 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> 에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and StatusMaxDateTime, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Type> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>지정 된 갖도록 상태 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>StatusMaxDateTime, 고 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> 여 지정 된 개체</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> 중 하나 이상 일치 하는 데이터 추출 및</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> 으로 지정 된 기간 동안</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> 하 여</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> , 지정 된</xref:System.Type> 있는 워크플로 인스턴스로</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체의</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> 집합을 제한합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by StatusMaxDateTime is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>StatusMaxDateTime에서 지정한 값이 포함 됩니다.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 상태와 일치 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>속성.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 경우 `WorkflowStatus` null로 설정 되어 `StatusMaxDateTime` 및 `StatusMinDateTime` 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: 모든 워크플로 인스턴스가 반환 됩니다 때 `GetWorkflows` 라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the upper limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*> 지정 된 상태를 사용 하 여 워크플로 인스턴스를 일치에 사용 되는 시간 간격의 상한값을 지정 하</xref:System.DateTime> 는

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that, together with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref:System.DateTime>는와 함께 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, 집합을 제한 하는 데 사용 되 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> 에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by StatusMinDateTime and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>집합을 제한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>있는 워크플로 인스턴스로 <xref:System.Type>에 지정 된 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, 된 지정 된 상태가 있고 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>StatusMinDateTime에 지정 된 기간 동안 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> 여 지정 된 개체</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> 중 하나 이상 일치 하는 데이터 추출 된 및</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by StatusMinDateTime is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>StatusMinDateTime에서 지정한 값이 포함 됩니다.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 상태와 일치 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>속성.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 경우 `WorkflowStatus` null로 설정 되어 `StatusMaxDateTime` 및 `StatusMinDateTime` 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: 모든 워크플로 인스턴스가 반환 됩니다 때 `GetWorkflows` 라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the lower limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*> 지정 된 상태를 사용 하 여 워크플로 인스턴스를 일치에 사용 되는 시간 간격의 하 한을 지정 하</xref:System.DateTime> 는

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of data extract values which are used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 집합을 제한 하는 데 사용 되는 데이터 추출 값의 목록을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> 에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by TrackingDataItems.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>집합을 제한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>있는 워크플로 인스턴스로 <xref:System.Type>에 지정 된 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, 된 지정 된 상태가 있고 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>로 지정 된 기간 동안 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, 및 중 하나 이상 일치 하는 데이터 추출 된는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>TrackingDataItems 지정 된 개체입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records that contain data that is extracted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>포함 될 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>워크플로에서 추출 된 데이터가 포함 된 레코드.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The TrackingDataItems property contains <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects that specify certain values for this extracted data.
trans-unit.target: TrackingDataItems 속성 포함 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>이 특정 값을 지정 하는 개체 데이터를 추출 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance meets the other criteria specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> and TrackingDataItems is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the extracted data stored in the database for a workflow instance must match one or more of the extracted data values specified by the TrackingDataItems property for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object to be returned for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 지정 된 다른 조건을 만족 하는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>TrackingDataItems null 참조가 아니며 (`Nothing`), 워크플로 인스턴스에 대 한 데이터베이스에 저장 된 추출한 데이터가 하 나와 일치 해야 또는 추출한 데이터 값에 대 한 TrackingDataItems 속성에 지정 된는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>워크플로 인스턴스에 대해 반환 될 개체입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: If TrackingDataItems is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by the values of the extracted data for any of the workflow instances in the database.
trans-unit.target: TrackingDataItems이 null 참조 (`Nothing`), 집합이 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>워크플로 인스턴스는 데이터베이스에 대해 추출된 된 데이터 값에 의해 반환 되는 개체를 제한 되지 것입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"></xref> objects that contains specified values to be matched for data extracted from the workflow instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> 의 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"> </xref> 에 포함 된 개체 지정 된 워크플로 인스턴스 또는 null 참조에서 추출 된 데이터에 대 한 일치 하는 값 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> value that is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"> </xref> 값 집합을 제한 하는 데 사용 되는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> 에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by WorkflowStatus during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>집합을 제한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>있는 워크플로 인스턴스로 <xref:System.Type>에 지정 된 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, 지정 된 기간 동안 WorkflowStatus가 지정한 상태에 있는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> 여 지정 된 개체</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> 중 하나 이상 일치 하는 데이터 추출 된 및</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches WorkflowStatus if the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> value that maps to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> value specified by WorkflowStatus.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스가 있으면 WorkflowStatus를 일치 하는 상태인 것으로 간주 됩니다 마지막 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>해당 워크플로 인스턴스의 전이나 도중 지정 된 기간에 대 한 받은 해당 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성이로 설정는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>값에 매핑되는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>WorkflowStatus로 지정 된 값.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance must have a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is configured for the appropriate <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 따라서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>워크플로 인스턴스가 있어야는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>하도록 구성 되어 있는 적절 한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName>값.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that have been sent in workflow tracking records can be matched.
trans-unit.target: 만 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>보낸 워크플로 추적 레코드에는 값을 일치 시킬 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: If no workflow tracking records have been sent for the workflow instance, the workflow instance is considered to have a status of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스에 대 한 워크플로 추적 레코드가 전송 된, 워크플로 인스턴스 상태의 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> 으로 간주 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the mapping between <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 간의 매핑이 나와 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>값 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>값.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: |TrackingWorkflowEvent value|WorkflowStatus value| |---------------------------------|--------------------------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| If WorkflowStatus is null (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by status; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: | TrackingWorkflowEvent 값 | WorkflowStatus 값 | |---------------------------------|--------------------------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| WorkflowStatus null 이면 (`Nothing`), 집합이 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>; 상태에 의해 반환 되는 개체를 제한 되지 것입니다 즉, 한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> 의 다른 속성에 지정 된 매개 변수가 일치 하는 모든 워크플로 인스턴스에 대해 개체를 반환</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> values or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"> </xref> 값 또는 null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: The default is null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the workflow instance <xref:System.Type> that is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스를 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref:System.Type>집합을 제한 하는 데 사용 되는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> 에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by WorkflowType, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>집합을 제한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>에 대 한 호출에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>있는 워크플로 인스턴스로 <xref:System.Type>WorkflowType로 지정 된 상태의 지정 된 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>로 지정 된 기간 동안 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> 여 지정 된 개체</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> 중 하나 이상 일치 하는 데이터 추출 된 및</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: If WorkflowType is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by workflow <xref:System.Type>; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowType이 null 참조 (`Nothing`), 집합 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>워크플로 <xref:System.Type>합니다; 즉, 한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>일치 매개 변수 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> 의 다른 속성에 지정 된 모든 워크플로 인스턴스에 대해 반환 됩니다 개체</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Type> 에서 반환 되는 개체를 제한 되지 것입니다</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 null 참조 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> Visual basic에서).
